item.title: Apprie
item.description: Apprie is a patient-centered open-source application. This is currently just a passion project but would be happy to discuss with potential collaborators/investors!

item.title: Manifesto
item.description: Manifesto is an app that helps users tune into their dreams. The user gives a prompt with details of the dream that has already come true. Manifesto generates a meditation that helps users visualize their dreams as if it is happening in real life.

item.title: The Evolution of Trust (Filipino Translation)
item.description: We created a Filipino Translation of the Evolution of Trust originally created by Nicky Chase.
